examples.title: 2009 Ideb Score of Schools in Brazil
examples.author: DoingData, Alberto Cairo
examples.note: This chart is a strip plot (a.k.a. jitter plot). Each dot represents a school. Alberto Cairo used it in his book 'The Truthful Art' to visualize Ideb Score (quality of education) of more than 19,000 schools in Brazil.

examples.title: Population of the densest 200 grid cells in each city
examples.author: CityLab
